text: Mallyan Spout is a waterfall in North Yorkshire, England, the tallest waterfall in the North Yorkshire Moors.Moors Knowledge: Mallyan Spout, accessed 3 December 2016 ==Geography== The waterfall is located in the village of Goathland and has a vertical drop of 70 feet. == References == == External links == * Goathland, Mallyan Spout and Beck Hole Category:Waterfalls of North Yorkshire Category:Landforms of North Yorkshire
title: Mallyan Spout
